DOC.brief_summary: The purpose small randomize control trial ( RCT ) compare impact brief ( 16 hour ) 3rd trim mindfulness-based childbirth education program , `` Mind Labor ( MIL ) : Working Pain Childbirth , '' standard care/ '' treatment usual '' ( TAU ) active control condition standard hospital- community-based childbirth education . The MIL group expect demonstrate reduction fear labor ( less pain catastrophizing great childbirth self-efficacy ) , less perceive pain labor , less use pain medication labor , great birth satisfaction , good prenatal postpartum psychological adjustment compare TAU group .
DOC.brief_title: Prenatal Education About Reducing Labor Stress ( PEARLS )
DOC.criteria: Age 18 No prior fullterm pregnancy live birth prior current pregnancy In 3rd trimester healthy , singleton pregnancy Willingness randomize Able read , write , understand speak English Planned hospital birth San Francisco Bay Area Current prior formal meditation experience Formal yoga practice prior pregnancy ( brief prenatal yoga practice lead exclusion ) Participation mind/body childbirth preparation course ( e.g. , hypnosis focus ) Planned elective Cesarean birth Planned homebirth nonhospital birth set
